activities: Tax reclamation filings for cross border withheld taxes based upon International Tax Treaties. Relief at source arrangements for said withheld taxes on cross border interest and corporate actions.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Globe Tax is committed to cooperate with Data Protection Authorities located in the European Union (EU DPAs) or their authorized representatives, as well as the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC), and the FTC or other recognized authority of the U.S. government.
